## TrustManifest type

The on-disk trust manifest. Maps a namespace string to its approved-hash entry.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type TrustManifest = Map<string, TrustManifestEntry>;
```
**References:** [TrustManifestEntry](./vaultkeeper.trustmanifestentry.md)
